tool_description: The Wikifakt API is a simple and lightweight service that provides random facts and trivia sourced from various knowledge domains. It offers users an easy way to access interesting and educational information in a random fashion. Whether you're looking for a fun fact to share with friends or seeking knowledge on a wide range of topics, the Wikifakt API has you covered.
name: Wikifakt API
title: Wikifakt API

api_list.name: postGeneratorFact
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://wikifakt-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/factwiki"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wikifakt-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://wikifakt-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/factwiki"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wikifakt-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
